Page.title: About
Page._content:
GPU Cloud at the Edge Beyond

Delivering high performance, streamlined infrastructure, and flexible AI/ML deploymentwherever you need it.

Our Mission & Milestones

2023

2023 2024 2025

QBO was founded in 2023 to transform the cloud compute landscape.

QBO is a San Franciscobased technology company reimagining cloud infrastructure for AI and GPU-powered workloads. Built in the heart of the Financial District, QBO combines performance, simplicity, and sovereigntyenabling organizations to run high-performance compute anywhere.

Our founding team brings decades of experience from industry leaders such as Sysdig, Riverbed, NGINX, F5, Portworx, Pure Storage, Splunk, and Cisco. With deep roots in cloud, data infrastructure, observability, and scalable systems, were building infrastructure that meets the demands of modern AIwithout the complexity of legacy cloud providers.

Our Vision

To democratize access to high-performance GPU compute, empowering innovators of all backgrounds to create, build, and scale without technical or financial barriers.

Page.title: Contact
Page._content:
We Love to Hear
From You

Have questions or need a live demo? Were here to help.

Get In Touch

Please fill out the form or send your inquiry to info@qbo.io if you prefer. Well get back to you as soon as possible.

Page.title: Home
Page._content:
Run AI Anywhere With Metal Performance

QBO brings orchestrated GPUs, Kubernetes, and container infrastructure to your data center, edge, or private cloud.

AI Workloads, Unlocked On Your Metal, Partner Metal, or Ours

No VMs. No noise. Just fast, orchestrated GPU infrastructure for real AI workloads.

Turn Metal into Revenue Fast

QBO makes your servers GPU-cloud ready. One platform. All your tenants. Maximum ROI.

Schedule a Discovery Meeting

Trusted by leading AI labs, platforms, and enterprises

QBO, Purpose-Built for AI at the Edge

Experience no-compromise metal performance and unlock the full potential of your AI innovations with QBO at the edge.

QBO delivers metal-level performance with Kubernetes-in-Docker and Docker-in-Docker solutions, ensuring unmatched efficiency for AI workloads.

With QBO, all infrastructure dependenciesincluding DNS, Load Balancing, Firewall, Authentication, ACME, and more are fully integrated, simplifying deployment and management.

Build GPU clouds with just servers, high-performance network cards, and switches, and at a fraction of the cost of hyperscalers.

Deploy on-prem, in the public cloud, at the edge, or in airgapped environmentswith total control and flexibility.

Explore QBOs GPU Cloud Services

Maximize your potential with QBO and accelerate your time to market, so you can focus on what you do best: building, training, and deploying AI models
that are transforming the world.

QBO Kubernetes Engine

QKE delivers a powerful Kubernetes environment powered by KinD
(Kubernetes in Docker), optimized with the NVIDIA GPU Operator

QBO Kubernetes Engine

  • Experience next-generation Kubernetes with QKE, a high-performance platform built on KinD (Kubernetes in Docker) and enhanced with the NVIDIA GPU Operator.
  • Deploy and manage clusters at scale with seamless GPU acceleration for AI/ML workloads. QKE delivers upstream Kubernetes with Kubeflow-ready support, full CNCF certification, and compatibility with the latest distributions.
  • QKE runs with metal-like performanceoptimized for GPU, disk, network, and memorywhile packaging all critical infrastructure dependencies: networking, security, storage, and observability. No external services required.
  • Unlock the full potential of containerized AIdeployed at the edge or anywhere

QBO Container Engine

QCE simplifies container management with Docker-in-Docker powered by the NVIDIA Container Toolkit.

QBO Container Engine

  • QCE simplifies container orchestration with Docker-in-Docker, fully integrated with the NVIDIA Container Toolkit for seamless GPU acceleration.
  • Deploy, scale, and manage compute instances effortlesslyall with metal-level performance for GPU, disk, network, and memory.
  • Ideal for 3D design, virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI), video editing, CUDA development, and even high-performance gamingQCE brings GPU-intensive workloads to life in containers.
  • With self-contained networking, security, storage, and observability, QCE requires no external dependenciesjust pure performance.
  • QCE powers the next generation of compute instances and workstationsdelivered in containers, accelerated by GPUs, and ready for the edge.

QBO, a New Approach to Cloud Computing

Zero Virtualization. Pure Containers. Unparalleled Metal Performance with QBO

Apps

Supports any application running on Linux or Kubernetes, including Linux and Windows workstations. Ideal for resource-intensive or real-time workloads that demand direct access to GPU, CPU, RAM, and disk delivering bare-metal performance without virtualization overhead.
From 3D design and video editing to AI/ML, gaming, and data processing, QBO ensures optimal performance across diverse use cases.

QBO AsyncAPI

Transforms bare-metal servers into a full-featured cloud computing platform by orchestrating containers, workloads, and infrastructure services through an event-driven architecture. QBO AsyncAPI enables dynamic compute provisioning, real-time API communication, and seamless scaling across distributed environments all without relying on external cloud dependencies.

QBO GPU Cloud

A high-performance cloud environment built for GPU-accelerated workloads.

Kubernetes-in-Docker (KinD) Kubernetes Engine: Deploy full Kubernetes clusters inside containers for isolated, reproducible environments.

Docker-in-Docker (DinD) Container Engine: Launch containerized compute instances with GPU support, ideal for standalone tasks or lightweight virtual workstations.

Self-contained infrastructure dependencies: Includes integrated Networking, Security, Storage, and Observability no external cloud services required.

Bare Metal Servers

Hardware and architecture-agnostic: QBO runs on any x86 or ARM server, regardless of vendor or configuration. No specialized hardware or virtualization layer is required just Linux.

Designed for AI workloads at the edge

Accelerate AI Infrastructure

1015x

Faster

QBO accelerates AI infrastructure by up to 96% compared to virtualized clouds. Deploy a 3-node cluster in 70 seconds vs. 15 minutes with hyperscalers.
Launch compute instances in sub-seconds, and scale infrastructure 10 faster all with dramatically simpler management.


With QBO, you deploy, scale, and adapt faster than ever leaving traditional hyperscalers behind.

Save on Cost Compared to Any Hyperscaler

75%+

Savings

QBO reduces cloud costs by up to 75% compared to traditional hyperscalers without sacrificing performance.
Benefit from built-in services like DNS, load balancing, networking, and core infrastructure, all included by default.


There are no hidden fees, no premium charges for basic services, and no billing surprises just predictable, efficient infrastructure at a fraction of the cost.

Do More with Less Hardware

10x

Density

QBO delivers up to 10 greater Kubernetes density by running clusters in lightweight containers rather than full virtual machines.
Where traditional setups may fit 15 Kubernetes VMs on a server, QBO can host 150 KinD-based clusters on the same hardware with full isolation, native performance, and zero virtualization overhead.

Streamline Deployments

5 Minutes

Setup

All infrastructure dependencies are fully self-contained within QBO, allowing you to spin up a complete cloud environment in minutes without relying on any external services.


This includes critical components such as Firewall, Load Balancer, DNS, User Management, Authentication, ACME, and more all integrated and ready out of the box.


With QBO, deployment is no longer a complex assembly of third-party tools its a single, unified platform built for speed and simplicity.

Bring Your Own Cloud

100%

Portability

With QBO, you can deploy your infrastructure anywhere on-premises, in the public cloud, at the edge, or even in air-gapped environments with complete mobility and control.


This flexibility ensures data sovereignty, simplifies compliance with regulatory requirements, and enhances security by letting you choose where and how your data and workloads are deployed.


Whether for enterprise, government, or regulated industries, QBO gives you the freedom to build your cloud on your terms.

Maximum Performance for AI/ML, Real-Time, and High I/O Workloads

100%

Metal Performance

QBO delivers bare-metal speed for AI/ML training, inference, real-time processing, and data-intensive workloads with zero virtualization overhead.


Achieve native-level performance for the most demanding applications, including GPU-accelerated compute, low-latency inference, and high-throughput I/O pipelines.


With QBO, you get direct access to hardware, maximizing resource efficiency and ensuring deterministic performance where it matters most.

Leading AI Innovators Trust QBO

QBO exhibits metal performance across the board with all our ML/AI workloads.

Simon McCormack VP Product, Drut

With QBO, we took our Kubernetes cluster build-time down from 9 minutes to 70 seconds. Its mind-blowing; Ive never seen anything like it!

Graham McGuiness Jigsaw24

I dont understand it cause in theory, it (a 60-second deployment) shouldnt be possible!

Riccardo Berardone Mobiliti Group

To be able to deliver on our GTM strategy, we needed a lower and predictable infrastructure cost model, like QBOs.

Grahame Smee CEO, OpExx

CNCF Member and Conformance

QBO is a proud Silver Member of CNCF and Linux Foundation. QBO Kubernetes also aligns with the Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) standards, ensuring adherence to best practices in cloud-native computing. This conformance establishes a solid foundation for interoperability.

Learn More

QBO accelerates AI infrastructure by up to 96% compared to virtualized clouds. Deploy a 3-node cluster in 70 seconds vs. 15 minutes with hyperscalers.
Launch compute instances in sub-seconds, and scale infrastructure 10 faster all with dramatically simpler management.


With QBO, you deploy, scale, and adapt faster than ever leaving traditional hyperscalers behind.

Save on Cost Compared to Any Hyperscaler

75%+

Savings

QBO reduces cloud costs by up to 75% compared to traditional hyperscalers without sacrificing performance.
Benefit from built-in services like DNS, load balancing, networking, and core infrastructure, all included by default.


There are no hidden fees, no premium charges for basic services, and no billing surprises just predictable, efficient infrastructure at a fraction of the cost.

Do More with Less Hardware

10x

Density

QBO delivers up to 10 greater Kubernetes density by running clusters in lightweight containers rather than full virtual machines.
Where traditional setups may fit 15 Kubernetes VMs on a server, QBO can host 150 KinD-based clusters on the same hardware with full isolation, native performance, and zero virtualization overhead.

Streamline Deployments

5 Minutes

Setup

All infrastructure dependencies are fully self-contained within QBO, allowing you to spin up a complete cloud environment in minutes without relying on any external services.


This includes critical components such as Firewall, Load Balancer, DNS, User Management, Authentication, ACME, and more all integrated and ready out of the box.


With QBO, deployment is no longer a complex assembly of third-party tools its a single, unified platform built for speed and simplicity.

Bring Your Own Cloud

100%

Portability

With QBO, you can deploy your infrastructure anywhere on-premises, in the public cloud, at the edge, or even in air-gapped environments with complete mobility and control.


This flexibility ensures data sovereignty, simplifies compliance with regulatory requirements, and enhances security by letting you choose where and how your data and workloads are deployed.


Whether for enterprise, government, or regulated industries, QBO gives you the freedom to build your cloud on your terms.

Maximum Performance for AI/ML, Real-Time, and High I/O Workloads

100%

Metal Performance

QBO delivers bare-metal speed for AI/ML training, inference, real-time processing, and data-intensive workloads with zero virtualization overhead.


Achieve native-level performance for the most demanding applications, including GPU-accelerated compute, low-latency inference, and high-throughput I/O pipelines.


With QBO, you get direct access to hardware, maximizing resource efficiency and ensuring deterministic performance where it matters most.

Leading AI Innovators Trust QBO

QBO exhibits metal performance across the board with all our ML/AI workloads.

Simon McCormack VP Product, Drut

With QBO, we took our Kubernetes cluster build-time down from 9 minutes to 70 seconds. Its mind-blowing; Ive never seen anything like it!

Graham McGuiness Jigsaw24

I dont understand it cause in theory, it (a 60-second deployment) shouldnt be possible!

Riccardo Berardone Mobiliti Group

To be able to deliver on our GTM strategy, we needed a lower and predictable infrastructure cost model, like QBOs.

Grahame Smee CEO, OpExx

CNCF Member and Conformance

QBO is a proud Silver Member of CNCF and Linux Foundation. QBO Kubernetes also aligns with the Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) standards, ensuring adherence to best practices in cloud-native computing. This conformance establishes a solid foundation for interoperability.

Learn More

Page.title: why-qbo
Page._content:
The Future of Edge Cloud Solutions

Transform your infrastructure that works on your terms

Schedule a Discovery Meeting

No-Compromise Metal Performance with QBO, Purpose-Built for AI at the Edge

QBO delivers metal-level performance with Kubernetes-in-Docker and Docker-in-Docker solutions, ensuring unmatched efficiency for AI workloads.

With QBO, all infrastructure dependenciesincluding DNS, Load Balancing, Firewall, Authentication, ACME, and moreare fully integrated, simplifying deployment and management.

Build GPU clouds with just servers, high-performance network cards, and switches, and at a fraction of the cost of hyperscalers.

Deploy on-prem, in the public cloud, at the edge, or in airgapped environmentswith total control and flexibility.

Unlock the full potential of your AI innovations with QBO at the edge.

Experience the QBO Difference

Our edge cloud solutions provide enterprises with the scalability of public cloud, the control of private cloud, the flexibility of hybrid cloud, the cost efficiency of large capital expenditure (CapEx), and the agility of optimized operational expenditure (OpEx).

Learn More

Deploy Cloud Anywhere

TTurn any bare-metal server into a fully functional cloud platform, whether its: - On-premises for security and control. - At the edge for ultra-low latency and performance. - In a colocation facility to leverage dedicated infrastructure. - In a hybrid-cloud model to connect seamlessly across environments.

Scale Like Public Cloud, Control Like Private Cloud

Gain complete control while maintaining cloud-like scalability: - No virtualization overhead Direct hardware access ensures peak performance. - Full workload isolation Unlike shared infrastructure, every process runs independently. - Self-contained architecture No reliance on external dependencies like DNS, firewalls, or load balancers.

The Best of CapEx and OpEx

Combine CapEx and OpEx strategies to reduce costs and optimize ROI: - Own hardware for long-term cost efficiency. - Scale on demand using flexible consumption models. - Pay for what you use without hyperscaler markups.

Avoid Vendor Lock-In with Open-Source Compatibility

QBO is CNCF Kubernetes-certified, meaning it runs Kubernetes-native applications without modification. Enterprises can: - Move workloads freely between cloud providers. - Avoid being locked into proprietary hyperscaler services. - Leverage open standards instead of vendor-controlled infrastructure.

Security Without Third-Party Risks

Secure your own infrastructure without compromise: - Workloads fully isolated at the process level. - Air-gapped deployments, secure and offline operation for highly regulated industries. - No reliance on third-party security layersenterprises maintain full control.

Leading AI Innovators Trust QBO

QBO exhibits metal performance across the board with all our ML/AI workloads.

Simon McCormack VP Product, Drut

With QBO, we took our Kubernetes cluster build-time down from 9 minutes to 70 seconds. Its mind-blowing; Ive never seen anything like it!

Graham McGuiness Jigsaw24

I dont understand it cause in theory, it (a 60-second deployment) shouldnt be possible!

Riccardo Berardone Mobiliti Group

To be able to deliver on our GTM strategy, we needed a lower and predictable infrastructure cost model, like QBOs.

Grahame Smee CEO, OpExx

QBO, the catalyst for edge cloud evolution

Ready to rethink how you deploy and manage edge cloud infrastructure?

Request Demo

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
Post.raw:

title: Hello World
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
